title: where did this fistbump ward come from?
body:
i was going through the ward skins in the shop when i noticed i owned this fistbump ward. after some googling the only info i could find was that you had to go to pax and get a code for it but i didnt go to pax or get a code o: 

now dont get me wrong i am not complaining at all! im just curios as to how i came to posses this, (like did riot hand them out to everyone at a point?) 

(that aside thankyou rito :D )

replies.body: They're generally earned from meeting a Rioter IRL, such as at an event. :]

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=ma0WVr4Z,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-18T18:08:30.077+0000)
>
> They're generally earned from meeting a Rioter IRL, such as at an event. :]

It's hard for me to thank him personally since I don't see him around here but if you have a chance, please let Lyte know that I really appreciate the skin and ward he gave me.  It means a lot! :)
I#m not sure, but it's possible to gift skins, maybe someone else redeemed a code for you? Do you have any of the typical skins?, (Pax Riot)

> Riot KateyKhaos (NA)  - 6 days ago 1 of 1 Rioter Comments
They're generally earned from meeting a Rioter IRL, such as at an event. :]

So, if I ask you for one on here right now it Is a No?  KK, I'm asking :)) Can I have a Fist Bump ?  Please ! I'd cherish it :))))
Can you get one from asking a Rioter on the boards ?  --Wink Wink - Hint Hint :)

There was an event here on the boards - a discussion started by Lyte asking players to let him post their positive chat logs.

Players who took part in that received the Fist Bump Ward skin, along with (I think) Riot Kayle. That *may* be where it came from.

> [{quoted}](name=Jubbinaut,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=ma0WVr4Z,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-18T09:19:21.140+0000)
>
> There was an event here on the boards - a discussion started by Lyte asking players to let him post their positive chat logs.
> 
> Players who took part in that received the Fist Bump Ward skin, along with (I think) Riot Kayle. That *may* be where it came from.

aaah i dont think i partook in anything like that
Ah, well. I dunno, then. Good luck figuring it out!
